description:
What’s better than a cherry on top? Well, nothing, but a big furry pompom is close second. Cute and cozy, this beanie has a thick cable knit that traps warm air, making chilly days a lot more enjoyable.

  • Recycled polyester yarns are soft and warm
  • Faux fur adds a little fun
  • Cuff doubles the insulation where you need it most
name: The North Face Oh Mega Fur Pom Beanie - Women's
